verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Choodumu sodarudaa neevu nede lechi rakshana korakai Vedumu snehithudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lemmu neeku velugu vachchenu Kammuchunnadi cheekati lokamun Chimma cheekati janamula gammenu nemmadi nondaka Lechi raa nammumu sodarudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni vaakyamu velugai yunnadi Aa veluge neeku jeevamai yunnadi Nee venuke aajeevamu nilachenu jeevamu nondaga vegame raa Raavo sodarudaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Niluvumu nee jeevamu aaviriye Ilalo ledika needani cheppedu Kalushamu lellanu kadugunu kristu niluchunu ila nee kaapariyai Caluvari chentaku raa{/lang-eng}
